abstract: Some eminent sports medicine specialists are taking a stand against what they see as the vast overuse of magnetic resonance imaging in their field; these specialists say that MRI scans are easily misinterpreted and can result in misdiagnosis, leading to unnecessary or even harmful treatments. (Series: The Athlete's Pain)
snippet: Some specialists are taking a stand against overreliance on the scans, saying they are easily misinterpreted.
lead_paragraph: Some specialists are taking a stand against overreliance on the scans, saying they are easily misinterpreted.

headline.main: Sports Medicine Said to Overuse M.R.I.’s
headline.print_headline: Sports Medicine Said to Overuse A Popular Scan
headline.seo: M.R.I.’s, Often Overused, Often Mislead, Doctors Warn
